1 #include "swarmus_turtlebot/Navigation.hpp"
2 #include <geometry_msgs/TransformStamped.h>
3 #include <math.h>
4 #include <tf2_geometry_msgs/tf2_geometry_msgs.h>
5 
6 static const uint32_t QUEUE_SIZE{1000};
7 const std::string ROBOT_BASE_FRAME{"base_footprint"};
8 const std::string MOVEBY_TOPIC{"navigation/moveBy"};
9 const std::string MOVEBASE_GOAL_TOPIC{"move_base_simple/goal"};
10 
11 /*************************************************************************************************/
12 Navigation::Navigation(std::shared_ptr<ros::NodeHandle> p_NodeHandle) : m_tfListener(m_tfBuffer) {
13  if (p_NodeHandle) {
14  m_NodeHandle = p_NodeHandle;
15 
16  fetchRosParameters();
17 
18  ROS_INFO("Subscribing to: %s",
19  (ros::this_node::getNamespace() + "/" + MOVEBY_TOPIC).c_str());
20  m_MoveBySubscriber =
21  m_NodeHandle->subscribe(MOVEBY_TOPIC, QUEUE_SIZE, &Navigation::moveByCallback, this);
22 
23  m_GoalPublisher =
24  m_NodeHandle->advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(MOVEBASE_GOAL_TOPIC, QUEUE_SIZE);
25  }
26 }
27 
28 Navigation::~Navigation() { return; }
29 
30 /*************************************************************************************************/
31 void Navigation::fetchRosParameters() {
32  if (ros::param::get("~tf_prefix", m_RosParameters.tf_prefix)) {
33  ROS_INFO("tf_prefix provided: %s", m_RosParameters.tf_prefix.c_str());
34 
35  m_robotBaseFrame = m_RosParameters.tf_prefix + "/" + ROBOT_BASE_FRAME;
36 
37  const std::string moveBaseGlobalFrameParam = "move_base/global_costmap/global_frame";
38  if (ros::param::get(moveBaseGlobalFrameParam, m_RosParameters.moveBaseGlobalFrame)) {
39  // TODO add a check to see if a transform exist between frames
40  m_doGoalNeedsTransform = m_RosParameters.moveBaseGlobalFrame != m_robotBaseFrame;
41  } else {
42  ROS_WARN("Couldn't get the global frame of the move_base's global costmap. The "
43  "swarmus_turtlebot node will publish goal in the %s frame",
44  m_robotBaseFrame.c_str());
45  m_doGoalNeedsTransform = false;
46  }
47  } else {
48  m_robotBaseFrame = ROBOT_BASE_FRAME;
49  m_doGoalNeedsTransform = false;
50  ROS_WARN("No tf_prefix was provided. The swarmus_turtlebot node will publish goal in "
51  "the %s frame",
52  m_robotBaseFrame.c_str());
53  }
54 }
55 
56 /*************************************************************************************************/
57 void Navigation::moveByCallback(const swarmus_turtlebot::MoveBy& msg) {
58  // Generate the goal pose in the robot base frame
59  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped goalPose;
60 
61  goalPose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
62 
63  goalPose.pose.position.x = msg.distance_x;
64  goalPose.pose.position.y = msg.distance_y;
65  goalPose.pose.position.z = 0;
66 
67  float theta = atan2(msg.distance_y, msg.distance_x);
68 
69  goalPose.pose.orientation.x = 0;
70  goalPose.pose.orientation.y = 0;
71  goalPose.pose.orientation.z = sin(theta / 2.0); // Always around z as moveBy is in 2D
72  goalPose.pose.orientation.w = cos(theta / 2.0);
73 
74  // Transform the goal in the global frame if needed
75  if (m_doGoalNeedsTransform) {
76  goalPose = getGoalInGlobalFrame(goalPose);
77  goalPose.header.frame_id = m_RosParameters.moveBaseGlobalFrame;
78  } else {
79  goalPose.header.frame_id = m_robotBaseFrame;
80  }
81 
82  // Update the current goal
83  m_CurrentGoal.target_pose = goalPose;
84  m_hasNewGoal = true;
85 }
86 
87 geometry_msgs::PoseStamped Navigation::getGoalInGlobalFrame(
88  const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped goalInBaseFrame) {
89 
90  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped robotBaseToGlobalTransform;
91  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped goalInGlobalFrame;
92 
93  try {
94  robotBaseToGlobalTransform = m_tfBuffer.lookupTransform(m_RosParameters.moveBaseGlobalFrame,
95  m_robotBaseFrame, ros::Time(0));
96 
97  tf2::doTransform(goalInBaseFrame, goalInGlobalFrame, robotBaseToGlobalTransform);
98  } catch (tf2::TransformException& ex) {
99  ROS_WARN("Navigation: %s", ex.what());
100  }
101 
102  return goalInGlobalFrame;
103 }
104 
105 /*************************************************************************************************/
106 void Navigation::execute() {
107  if (m_hasNewGoal) {
108  m_GoalPublisher.publish(m_CurrentGoal.target_pose);
109  m_hasNewGoal = false;
110  }
111 }
